definition: to grow/to nourish/to increase/to cause/juice/taste/(dialect) to spout/to spurt
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
trophoblastic layer (attaches fertilized ovum to the uterus)/trophoderm

sentences.english: Abundant kidney-yin nourishes the organs in the body.
sentences.chinese: 肾阴足，肌体各脏腑组织器官得到滋养。

sentences.english: The blood feeds the body tissue.
The volume of trophozoites and their nuclei was calculated.
sentences.chinese: 计算滋养体和核的体积。

sentences.english: Villi are not present. Rather, there is a proliferation of bizarre trophoblastic cells.
sentences.chinese: 绒毛不存在，明显异型性的胚胎滋养层细胞增殖显著。

sentences.english: Villous edema and trophoblast of cell proliferation without clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 绒毛水肿和滋养叶细胞增生无临床意义。

sentences.english: The vascular canals, which do not appear in the bone rods, but be seen on the surface of the bone plates.
sentences.chinese: 在骨板表面可见血管滋养孔，而骨柱表面则未见到。

sentences.english: Blood and body fluid are liquids and, what's more, they both perform the nourishing and moistening functions.
sentences.chinese: 血和津液都是液体，而且它们都有滋养功能。

sentences.english: You are delicate as a flower and you need love to survive.
sentences.chinese: 你如花朵般娇弱，需要爱的滋养。

sentences.english: The formulation offers soothing, demulcent herbs in conjunction with botanicals traditionally used to tonify the lungs.
sentences.chinese: 此配方供给了暖和的草药和传统的植物，来滋养肺部。

sentences.english: A little life with dried tubers .
sentences.chinese: 使干枯的根芽得到一点点生命的滋养。

sentences.english: Gentle nourishes your mind with calm. Gentle releases stress and tension.
sentences.chinese: 从容用平静滋养你的头脑，从容为你释放压力和紧张。

sentences.english: The fog nourishes plant communities from cactuses to ferns.
sentences.chinese: 这雾滋养植物群体从仙人掌到蕨类。

sentences.english: While monastics are nourished mentally with Buddha Dharma every day, enjoying real bliss.
sentences.chinese: 出家人每天用佛法滋养内心才是真正的快乐。

sentences.english: And, this formula with antioxidants nourishes your skin to keep it healthier-looking tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 而且，这种抗氧化剂配方滋养你的皮肤保持健康。

definition: to permeate/to percolate/fig. to saturate (with emotion)
best feature/most important part of an object/quintessence/essence/soul
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
to be pregnant/to produce offspring/to nurture (a development, school of thought, artwork etc)/fig. replete with (culture etc)
to grow and multiply without end
to be contaminated/to be gradually influenced
